column4: Hey, sdparm and hdparm will not work to set dma.. I need to because I need to install freenas bsd server on and it needs dma. All threads on this subject discuss everything but how to fix the problem
So how i set dma when it says "HDIO_SET_DMA failed: Inappropriate ioctl for device ubuntu"
Anyone know about this error:HDIO_SET_DMA failed: Inappropriate ioctl for device ubuntu
Anyone know what I can do to avoid this error while trying to set dma "HDIO_SET_DMA failed: Inappropriate ioctl for device ubuntu"
I love how helpful the ubuntu community is. Can anyone help me this this error "HDIO_SET_DMA failed: Inappropriate ioctl for device ubuntu"
looks like nobody in here has experience with that.. might try #ubuntu-server
